name: Rita Wheeler
description: Rita's hairstyle consists of pink-purple hair styled into twin buns. She has long bangs that frame her face. Her skin appears to be synthetic in nature, possibly a variant ofRealSkinn. She wears blue eyeshadow and magenta lipstick, which complement her grayish-green eyes. For clothing, she wears a poorly cropped white tank top with a double gun holster as her outer layer. She pairs it with black latex pants featuring a magenta gradient. Her high heels are integrated into her pants. Rita's arms are fully chromed out with cyberware featuring pink and cyan accents.
